white: Riding that Grey Warden stamina all night.
Fine dwarven crack, direct from Orzammar.
Roasting marshmallows in the Chantry explosion.
Finding Anders in DAI, bringing him to judgment, and sentencing him to exile ... at a nice little cottage on the beach with Hawke.
